name: Lost Eye Found
description:
Notice: Do not go in fullscreen on web build as there is a bug that breaks the controls when switching back and forth between full and minimized.

Ocula is a doll prone to sleepwalking. In her sleep, she accidentally misplaces her eyes around her house. Using her sight, guide Ocula's body back to her eyes. The day must go on!

A game made for Global Game Jam 2021.
